attributes.action: Demand that the millions of UK English speaking people around the World be given the option of a UK English version of Microsoft Vista
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the number of foreign language versions of this product for populations far less than that of UK English AND the fact we pay a ridiculous premium on this item, we have every right to an Anglicised version of this product.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
